item.title: Project 1 Stocks
item.description: Returns of financial stocks You may find useful the material on finance data sources. We will use the tidyquant package to download historical data of stock prices, calculate returns, and examine the distribution of returns. We must first identify which stocks we want to download data for, and for this we must know their ticker symbol; Apple is known as AAPL, Microsoft as MSFT, McDonaldâ€™s as MCD, etc.
